info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: creates a md5 checksum of a file or verifies file integrity based on a md5 checksum using md5sum

param.name: input
param.description: absolute path to file for which a checksum should be calculated or which should be verified

param.name: oldChecksumName
param.description: absolute path to a (non-existent) file used to identify the correct checksum line for cases in which the file was renamed or moved after checksum creation; can only be used in verify mode

param.name: checksum
param.description: absolute path to the checksum file; by default '.checksum.md5' located in the same directory as the input file

param.name: verify
param.description: flag to verify integrity of a file based on the checksum file

param.name: update
param.description: flag to update an already existing checksum in the checksum file

param.name: absolutePath
param.description: flag to store an absolute path in the checksum file instead of a relative one

param.name: ignorePath
param.description: flag to use only the name of the file for identification of the corresponding checksum line (ignores the location of the file); can only be used in verify mode
